00100 
00101 class DMatrix
00102 {
00103 private:
00104   int row,col;
00105   double *elements;
00106 
00107 public:
00108   DMatrix(int,int);
00109   DMatrix(int);    
00110   DMatrix(DMatrix &); 
00112   ~DMatrix() { delete elements;}
00113 
00114   DMatrix operator+(DMatrix &); 
00115   DMatrix operator-(DMatrix &); 
00116   DMatrix operator*(DMatrix &); 
00117   DMatrix operator*(double); 
00118   DMatrix &operator=(DMatrix &);
00119 
00120   double &operator()(int,int); 
00121   double &operator()(int); 
00122 
00123   void Print();
00124   double Sum();
00125   double QuadSum();
00126   DMatrix operator~();
00127   friend istream &operator>>(istream &,DMatrix &);
00128 
00129 };
00130 
00131 DMatrix::DMatrix(int r,int c)
00132 {
00133 elements = new double[r*c+1];
00134 memset(elements,' ',(r*c+1)*sizeof(double));
00135 row = r; col = c;
00136 }
00137 
00138 DMatrix::DMatrix(int r)
00139 {
00140   elements = new double[r+1];
00141   memset(elements,' ',(r+1)*sizeof(double));
00142   row = r;col = 1;
00143 }
00144 
00145 DMatrix::DMatrix(DMatrix &copy)
00146 {
00147   row = copy.row;
00148   col = copy.col;
00149   elements = new double[row*col+1];
00150   memcpy(elements,copy.elements,(row*col+1)*sizeof(double));
00151 }
00152 
00153 DMatrix DMatrix::operator+(DMatrix &right)
00154 {
00155   DMatrix left(*this);
00156   for (int i = 1; i <= row*col; i++)
00157     left.elements[i] = left.elements[i] + right.elements[i];
00158   return left;
00159 }
00160 
00161 DMatrix DMatrix::operator-(DMatrix &right)
00162 {
00163   DMatrix left(*this);
00164   for (int i = 1; i <= row*col; i++)
00165   {
00166     left.elements[i] = left.elements[i] - right.elements[i];
00167   }
00168   return left;
00169 }
00170 
00171 DMatrix DMatrix::operator*(DMatrix &right)
00172 {
00173   DMatrix prod(row,right.col);
00174   for (int i = 1; i <= row; i++)
00175   {
00176     for (int j = 1; j <= right.col; j++)
00177     {
00178       prod(i,j) = 0;
00179       for (int k = 1; k <= col; k++)
00180     prod(i,j) = prod(i,j) + (*this)(i,k)*right(k,j);
00181     }
00182   }
00183   return prod;
00184 }
00185 
00186 
00187 DMatrix DMatrix::operator*(double factor)
00188 {
00189   for (int i = 1; i <= row; i++)
00190   {
00191     for (int j = 1; j <= col; j++)
00192     {
00193       (*this)(i,j) =  (*this)(i,j) * factor;
00194     }
00195   }
00196   return *this;
00197 }
00198 
00199 
00200 DMatrix &DMatrix::operator=(DMatrix &right)
00201 {
00202   if (this == &right) return *this;
00203   else
00204     {
00205       delete elements;
00206       elements = new double[row*col+1];
00207       memcpy(elements,right.elements,(row*col+1)*sizeof(double));
00208       return *this;
00209     }
00210 }
00211 
00212 
00213 
00214 double &DMatrix::operator()(int r,int c)
00215 {
00216 return elements[(r-1)*col+c];
00217 }
00218 
00219 
00220 
00221 double &DMatrix::operator()(int r)
00222 {
00223 return elements[r];
00224 }
00225 
00226 
00227 
00228 void DMatrix::Print()
00229 {
00230   cout.setf(ios::fixed);
00231   cout << setprecision(4);
00232   for (int i = 1; i <= row; i++)
00233   {
00234     for (int j = 1; j <= col; j++)
00235       cout << setw(8) << (*this)(i,j);
00236     cout << endl;
00237   }
00238 }
00239 
00240 
00241 
00242 double DMatrix::Sum()
00243 {
00244   double temp = 0.0;
00245   for (int i = 1; i <= row; i++)
00246     for (int j = 1; j <= col; j++)
00247       temp += (*this)(i,j);
00248   return temp;
00249 }
00250 
00251 double DMatrix::QuadSum()
00252 {
00253   double temp = 0.0;
00254   for (int i = 1; i <= row; i++)
00255     for (int j = 1; j <= col; j++)
00256       temp += (*this)(i,j)*(*this)(i,j);
00257   return temp;
00258 }
00259 
00260 
00262 DMatrix DMatrix::operator~()
00263 {
00264   int i, j, k, n;
00265   int pivrow, tarrow;
00266   double pivelt, tarelt;
00267   n = row; // Zahl d.Gleich.
00268   DMatrix aug(n,2*col);
00269   DMatrix inverse(n,col);
00270   for (i = 1; i <= n; i++)
00271     for (j = 1; j <= col; j++)
00272       aug(i,j) = (*this)(i,j);
00273   for (i = 1; i <= n; i++)
00274     for (j = n+1; j <= aug.col; j++)
00275       if (i == j-n) aug(i,j) = 1; // Einheitsmatrix
00276   for (pivrow = 1; pivrow <= n; pivrow++)
00277   {
00278     pivelt = aug(pivrow,pivrow);
00279     if (pivelt == 0)
00280     {
00281       k = pivrow + 1;   // Pivotsuche
00282       while (pivelt == 0 && k <= n)
00283       {
00284     pivelt = aug(k,pivrow);
00285     k++;
00286       }
00287       if (pivelt == 0)
00288       { cerr << "dmatrix : ERROR - Inversion attempted, but matrix is singular!"; exit(1); }
00289     }
00290     else
00291     {k--;
00292     DMatrix dum(2*col);
00293     for (i = 1; i <= 2*col; i++)
00294       dum(i) = aug(pivrow,i);
00295     for (i = 1; i <= 2*col; i++)
00296       aug(pivrow,i) = aug(k,i);
00297     for (i = 1; i <= 2*col; i++)
00298       aug(k,i) = dum(i);
00299     }
00300   }
00301 
00302   for (j = 1; j <= 2*col; j++)
00303     aug(pivrow,j) = aug(pivrow,j)/pivelt;
00304   for (tarrow = 1; tarrow <= n; tarrow++)
00305     if (tarrow != pivrow)
00306     {
00307       tarelt = aug(tarrow,pivrow);
00308       for (j = 1; j<= 2*col; j++)
00309     aug(tarrow,j) = aug(tarrow,j) - aug(pivrow,j)*tarelt;
00310     }
00311   for (i = 1; i <= n; i++)
00312     for (j = n+1; j <= aug.col; j++)
00313       inverse(i,j-n) = aug(i,j);
00314   return inverse;
00315 }
00316 
00317 
00318 
00319 istream &operator>>(istream &is,DMatrix &m)
00320 {
00321   for (int i = 1; i <= m.row; i++)
00322     for (int j = 1; j <= m.col; j++)
00323       is >> m(i,j);
00324   return is;
00325 }

00329 #endif  /* _dmatrix_h_ */
